name: PONG PLAY
description:
This is my version of our classic Pong Game ,but unlike others in Pong play player is given up to six lives  and the winner is decided based on those lives.

Pong Play have both a single player mode and a two player on single keyboard mode.

Press Esc to pause the game.

Also play:

https://gamemakersp.itch.io/whats-next-hole

Music : 

Mega Pixel Music Labs (OpenGameArt.com)

https://opengameart.org/content/melody

All the rights related to the music used in this game belongs to Mega Pixel Music Labs.
